KGMU Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Senior Research Fellow Post
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Aug 23, 2025, 14:58 IST
 King Georges Medical University
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 23-Aug-2025 |  Uttar Pradesh |  Salary : 48,720 to 48,720




FOLLOW

King George's Medical University (KGMU) has declared the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., M.Tech., and Post Graduation can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the KGMU Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Uttar Pradesh.

KGMU Recruitment 2025 - Eligbility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.,of Vacancies	Qualification
Senior Research Fellow	01	M.Sc., M.Tech, Post-Graduation

Age Limit for the KGMU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Age Limit: 21 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 35 years.

Selection Process for the KGMU Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the KGMU Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 48,720 /- per month.

Application fee for the KGMU Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the KGMU Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Senior Research Fellow Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form carefully.
Then, send the application form to the email address given below.

Email Address

bandana.chakravarti@kgmcindia.edu

Important Dates

Starting Date of Application	13-08-2025
Last Date of Application	28-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
